Package model

Class Team

java.lang.Object
model.Team
public class Team extends Object
Represents a team in the game. A team has a name, money, score, list of champion, and list of weapons. If the team is an AI team, it will also have an aggression level. Each team can only purchase one champion per week. The chosen champions and chosen weapons lists are to be used during match setup.

    • randomlySelectPurchasables

      public void randomlySelectPurchasables()
      Randomly selects champions and weapons.

    • assignChosenWeapons

      public void assignChosenWeapons()
      Random assign the chosen weapons to chosen champions. If there is not enough chosen weapons, some champion won't get assigned a weapon and will keep the default weapon.

    • unselectPurchasables

      public void unselectPurchasables()
      Reset chosen champion and weapons.

    • unselectChampions

      public void unselectChampions()
      Remove all champions from the chosen champions.

    • unselectWeapons

      public void unselectWeapons()
      Remove all weapons from the chosen weapons.

    • unassignChosenWeapons

      public void unassignChosenWeapons()
      Reset chosen champions back to the default weapon.

    • rest

      public void rest()
      Reset weekly champion purchased back to false and rest up all champions back to pull stamina.
